languages.text: Броня, принадлежавшая командиру абордажной группы. Ее прошлый хозяин выдал Флоту Осознание своих нанимателей, оказавшихся техноеретиками. В скоординированной с Адептус Механикус атаке он залил палубы вражеского корабля кровью, но и сам встретил смерть. В знак уважения служители Омниссии сохранили и модифицировали его доспех, почтив новыми функциями героизм офицера.

Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.
languages.original_text: Броня, принадлежавшая командиру абордажной группы. Ее прошлый хозяин выдал Флоту Осознание своих нанимателей, оказавшихся техноеретиками. В скоординированной с Адептус Механикус атаке он залил палубы вражеского корабля кровью, но и сам встретил смерть. В знак уважения служители Омниссии сохранили и модифицировали его доспех, почтив новыми функциями героизм офицера.

As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

languages.text: Esta armadura fue propiedad del comandante de un equipo de abordaje que descubrió que le habían contratado tecnoherejes y los entregó a la Flota Conciencia. En un ataque coordinado con el Adeptus Mechanicus, hizo correr ríos de sangre por la nave enemiga, pero encontró la muerte durante el asalto. En señal de respeto, los sirvientes del Omnissiah conservaron y modificaron su armadura, honrando el heroísmo del oficial con nuevas funciones.
languages.original_text: Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

traits.locale_text: Esta armadura fue propiedad del comandante de un equipo de abordaje que descubrió que le habían contratado tecnoherejes y los entregó a la Flota Conciencia. En un ataque coordinado con el Adeptus Mechanicus, hizo correr ríos de sangre por la nave enemiga, pero encontró la muerte durante el asalto. En señal de respeto, los sirvientes del Omnissiah conservaron y modificaron su armadura, honrando el heroísmo del oficial con nuevas funciones.

languages.text: 以前は搭乗部隊の司令が所有していた鎧で、彼は自分の雇い主が技術異端であることを知り、コグニサンス艦隊に引き渡した。彼は帝国技術局との連携攻撃で敵艦の甲板を血で染めたが、その過程で死を迎えた。万機神に仕える者たちは敬意を表して彼の鎧を保存し、士官の英雄的行為を称えるために改造を施し、新たな機能を付け加えた。
languages.original_text: Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

traits.locale_text: 以前は搭乗部隊の司令が所有していた鎧で、彼は自分の雇い主が技術異端であることを知り、コグニサンス艦隊に引き渡した。彼は帝国技術局との連携攻撃で敵艦の甲板を血で染めたが、その過程で死を迎えた。万機神に仕える者たちは敬意を表して彼の鎧を保存し、士官の英雄的行為を称えるために改造を施し、新たな機能を付け加えた。

languages.text: 这套盔甲曾属于某支登舰作战小队的指挥官。这位指挥官发现自己的雇主是技术异端分子，于是便将雇主的位置告知了真理开拓者舰队。在那之后，他们与机械修会的部队展开了协同攻击，血洗了敌舰的甲板，但他本人却在那场战斗中丧生。为了表达对他的敬意，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人修好了这套盔甲，进行了改造，希望能通过新的功能来纪念这位军官的英雄壮举。
languages.original_text: Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

traits.locale_text: 这套盔甲曾属于某支登舰作战小队的指挥官。这位指挥官发现自己的雇主是技术异端分子，于是便将雇主的位置告知了真理开拓者舰队。在那之后，他们与机械修会的部队展开了协同攻击，血洗了敌舰的甲板，但他本人却在那场战斗中丧生。为了表达对他的敬意，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人修好了这套盔甲，进行了改造，希望能通过新的功能来纪念这位军官的英雄壮举。

languages.text: Eine Rüstung, die einst dem Kommandanten eines Enterkommandos gehörte. Als er feststellte, dass seine Arbeitgeber Tech-Ketzer waren, verriert er sie an die Erkenntnisflotte. Bei einem gemeinsam mit dem Adeptus Mechanicus ausgeführten Angriff färbte er die Decks des feindlichen Schiffs rot, fiel jedoch auch selbst. Als Zeichen des Respekts haben die Diener des Omnissiah seine Rüstung bewahrt und modifiziert und den Heldenmut des Offiziers durch neue Funktionen geehrt.
languages.original_text: Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

traits.locale_text: Eine Rüstung, die einst dem Kommandanten eines Enterkommandos gehörte. Als er feststellte, dass seine Arbeitgeber Tech-Ketzer waren, verriert er sie an die Erkenntnisflotte. Bei einem gemeinsam mit dem Adeptus Mechanicus ausgeführten Angriff färbte er die Decks des feindlichen Schiffs rot, fiel jedoch auch selbst. Als Zeichen des Respekts haben die Diener des Omnissiah seine Rüstung bewahrt und modifiziert und den Heldenmut des Offiziers durch neue Funktionen geehrt.

languages.text: Armure ayant appartenu au commandant d'un groupe d'abordage qui a livré ses commanditaires à la Flotte de la Connaissance après avoir découvert qu'ils étaient coupables de technohérésie. Au cours d'une attaque coordonnée avec les forces de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, il a noyé les ponts du bâtiment ennemi sous des flots de sang avant de périr à son tour. En gage de respect, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont préservé et modifié son armure, afin de rendre hommage à son héroïsme en lui adjoignant de nouvelles fonctions.
languages.original_text: Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

traits.locale_text: Armure ayant appartenu au commandant d'un groupe d'abordage qui a livré ses commanditaires à la Flotte de la Connaissance après avoir découvert qu'ils étaient coupables de technohérésie. Au cours d'une attaque coordonnée avec les forces de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, il a noyé les ponts du bâtiment ennemi sous des flots de sang avant de périr à son tour. En gage de respect, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont préservé et modifié son armure, afin de rendre hommage à son héroïsme en lui adjoignant de nouvelles fonctions.

languages.text: Daha öncesinde bir bordalama ekibinin komutanına ait olan zırh. Komutan, iş sahiplerinin tekno kâfirler olduğunu keşfederek onları Malumat Filosu'na ifşa etmiş. Adeptus Mechanicus ile ortaklaşa düzenlenen bir saldırıda düşman gemisinin güvertelerini kana bulasa da bu esnada canından olmuş. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, hürmetlerinin simgesi olarak zırhını koruyup modifiye etmişler ve subayın kahramanlığını yeni işlevlerle onurlandırmışlar.
languages.original_text: Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.
